_description: A Farewell anaphora to his mistress — ten monorhyming lines

TCD500.First Lines:
ffareth wele wirchepe and goodnesseffareth wele fairhede and
                    gentilesse…
TCD500.Last Lines:
…Be liek on to youre worthynesseSo het my ladi gracious and
                    glorious
TCD500.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Secular Lyrics of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: 207.
